translation.en: ♪ We're Super Monsters We're human in the daylight ♪
translation.ja: 太陽(たいよう)の下(した)では 人間(にんげん)だけど

translation.en: ♪ We're Super Monsters We become monsters at night ♪
translation.ja: 夜(よる)になれば 　　モンスターに変身(へんしん)だ

translation.en: ♪ Sun down! Monsters up! ♪
translation.ja: 日(ひ)が沈(しず)む モンスターズ･タイム！

translation.en: Woah! That's a lot of decorations!
translation.ja: 飾(かざ)りがいっぱいある

translation.en: [giggle] And that's a lot of twinkle lights!
translation.ja: イルミネーションも

translation.en: Oh! These twinkle lights are so tangled, even the knots have knots!
translation.ja: コードが多(おお)くて からまってしまった

translation.en: Don't worry, Igor, we'll help you untangle the lights!
translation.ja: ほどくのを手伝(てつだ)うよ

translation.en: And we'll help you hang them up too.
translation.ja: 飾(かざ)りつけも一緒(いっしょ)に

translation.en: But first, we need to untangle you! [giggle]
translation.ja: まずは先生(せんせい)を救出(きゅうしゅつ)しないと

translation.en: Oh! Thanks, kiddos. [chuckles] I'm not sure how this happened!
translation.ja: 助(たす)かるよ いつの間(ま)にかこうなってた

translation.en: -It's OK. -We've got this.
translation.ja: まかせて

translation.en: [Igor] Oh! Ho, ho, ho.
translation.ja: いくわよ

translation.en: Merry Christmas, everyone!
translation.ja: メリークリスマス！

translation.en: Spike, it isn't quite Christmas yet. It's still Christmas Eve!
translation.ja: スパイク　クリスマスは明日(あした) まだクリスマスイブ

translation.en: Oh, OK! Merry Christmas Eve, everyone!
translation.ja: そうか… メリークリスマスイブ！

translation.en: [all laughing] Merry Christmas Eve, Spike!
translation.ja: メリークリスマスイブ！

translation.en: Santa always says that... Oh!
translation.ja: サンタがいつも言(い)ってた

translation.en: ...twinkle lights and decorations really put him in the holiday spirit!
translation.ja: “クリスマスは 飾(かざ)りつけが大事(だいじ)だ”と

translation.en: Tonight, I want to try and make Santa the biggest,
translation.ja: 今夜(こんや)は最高(さいこう)の イルミネーションで―

translation.en: brightest, holiday display ever!
translation.ja: サンタを歓迎(かんげい)したいんじゃ

translation.en: We can use our superpowers to help!
translation.ja: スーパーパワーを使(つか)おう

translation.en: Aha! I can't wait to get started!
translation.ja: そう来(こ)なくちゃ

translation.en: Well, you won't have to wait much longer look!
translation.ja: それなら時間(じかん)よ　見(み)てごらん

translation.en: Sun down!
translation.ja: 日(ひ)が沈(しず)む

translation.en: [all] Monsters up!
translation.ja: モンスターズ･タイム！

translation.en: Drac!
translation.ja: ドラクだ！

translation.en: Katya.
translation.ja: カティアよ

translation.en: Lobo!
translation.ja: ロボだよ

translation.en: Zoe.
translation.ja: ゾーイ！

translation.en: Frankie!
translation.ja: フランキーだぞ！

translation.en: Cleo!
translation.ja: クレオよ

translation.en: Spike!
translation.ja: スパイクだ

translation.en: Vida!
translation.ja: ヴィーダ！

translation.en: [all] Super Monsters!
translation.ja: スーパーモンスターズだ！

translation.en: Igor, I know Santa loves holiday decorations...
translation.ja: 確(たし)かにサンタさんは 飾(かざ)りつけが好(す)きよね

translation.en: -He sure does! -But, remember,
translation.ja: もちろんだ でも 祝(いわ)う方法(ほうほう)なら 他(ほか)にもあるでしょ

translation.en: there are other ways to celebrate the holiday too...
translation.ja: でも 祝(いわ)う方法(ほうほう)なら 他(ほか)にもあるでしょ

translation.en: Well of course there are! But...
translation.ja: もちろん そうだ

translation.en: with the Super Monsters using all their powers to help me decorate the school,
translation.ja: しかし子供(こども)たちの パワーを使(つか)えば―

translation.en: this year will be the biggest and brightest celebration
translation.ja: 最高(さいこう)に豪華(ごうか)な クリスマスになる

translation.en: Santa's ever seen! Oh, he's going to love it!
translation.ja: サンタはびっくり！ 大喜(おおよろこ)びしてくれるさ

translation.en: Igor, how many of these twinkle lights do you want us to put up?
translation.ja: 飾(かざ)りには どのライトを使(つか)う？

translation.en: All of them!
translation.ja: 全部(ぜんぶ)だよ

translation.en: [Katya] All of them? Really?
translation.ja: これ全部(ぜんぶ)？　本当(ほんとう)に？

translation.en: [giggle] OK!
translation.ja: オッケー

translation.en: Does that mean we should use all of these decorations too?
translation.ja: つまり ここにある飾(かざ)りを全部(ぜんぶ)？

translation.en: Of course! Only the best for Santa!
translation.ja: そう　サンタにピッタリじゃ

translation.en: On it! Mega-size!
translation.ja: よし　大(おお)きくなれ！

translation.en: Let's start over there!
translation.ja: 始(はじ)めましょう

translation.en: ♪ Here with our friends Working together we have fun ♪
translation.ja: 楽(たの)しくがんばろう

translation.en: ♪ Come, give a hand That is the way we get things done ♪
translation.ja: 手(て)を貸(か)すよ それがボクらのやり方(かた)

translation.en: ♪ Working together We're Super Monsters ♪
translation.ja: 力(ちから)をあわせて モンスターズがついてる

translation.en: ♪ Here we come We're all in together ♪
translation.ja: モンスターズがついてる 一緒(いっしょ)に成長(せいちょう)しよう

translation.en: ♪ We work and play That's how we get things done ♪ ♪ Tan, tan, ta-ran ♪
translation.ja: 練習(れんしゅう)も遊(あそ)びも 　　みんなでやるのさ

translation.en: It looks amazing!
translation.ja: キレイよ

translation.en: Thanks, Katya. Um... Zoe, how do we get out of here?
translation.ja: ありがとう ゾーイ　どうやって出(で)る？

translation.en: -This way! -[both laughing]
translation.ja: ここからよ

translation.en: -[Katya] That's all the twinkle lights! -[Cleo] Beautiful!
translation.ja: これで全部(ぜんぶ)だ キレイだね　夢(ゆめ)みたい

translation.en: -[Spike] We did it. -[Frankie] Santa's going to love it.
translation.ja: キレイだね　夢(ゆめ)みたい

translation.en: Well done, Super Monsters! That's everything we had in the attic.
translation.ja: みんな よくやった 屋根裏(やねうら)の飾(かざ)りは使(つか)った

translation.en: Now, let's put up these decorations from the basement!
translation.ja: 今度(こんど)は地下室(ちかしつ)にある飾(かざ)りだぞ

translation.en: But there isn't anything left to decorate!
translation.ja: でも どこに飾(かざ)る？

translation.en: Oh, there is one thing left. And it wouldn't be Christmas without it...
translation.ja: クリスマスに なくてはならない物(もの)は？

translation.en: [all cheering] The Christmas Tree!
translation.ja: クリスマスツリーだ

translation.en: I'll get it! Mega-size!
translation.ja: ボクの出番(でばん)　大(おお)きくなれ

translation.en: Here it is!
translation.ja: 取(と)ってきたよ

translation.en: Igor, before we decorate the tree, can we turn on the other decorations?
translation.ja: その前(まえ)に ライトアップしない？

translation.en: Aww! I can't wait to see everything all lit up!
translation.ja: 早(はや)く見(み)たいんだ 賛成(さんせい)　早(はや)く見(み)たい！

translation.en: Of course we can!
translation.ja: もちろんだとも

translation.en: Frankie, I'll turn on the twinkle lights,
translation.ja: フランキー わしは屋根(やね)をつけるから

translation.en: if you'll power up the rest of the decorations.
translation.ja: 残(のこ)りのデコレーションを頼(たの)む

translation.en: -Ready? -Ready!
translation.ja: いい？ いくぞ モンスター･スマッシュだ！

translation.en: Frankie-mash, monster-smash!
translation.ja: いくぞ モンスター･スマッシュだ！

translation.en: Uh-huh! We did it!
translation.ja: 成功(せいこう)だ！

translation.en: Uh-oh, that's not good.
translation.ja: マズイぞ

translation.en: Oh, no! My monster-smash blew out the lights!
translation.ja: ボクのせいで 電気(でんき)が止(と)まったんだ

translation.en: No, Frankie, this wasn't your fault!
translation.ja: フランキーのせいじゃない

translation.en: I should have known that all those extra lights and decorations
translation.ja: 飾(かざ)りが多(おお)くて 電気(でんき)を使(つか)いすぎた

translation.en: would take too much power, but I did it anyway.
translation.ja: わしの判断(はんだん)ミスじゃ あとの祭(まつ)りだがね

translation.en: And look what happened.
translation.ja: これを見(み)てみろ

translation.en: I ruined Christmas for everyone!
translation.ja: クリスマスを台無(だいな)しにした

translation.en: -Poor Igor! -He's really upset.
translation.ja: イゴール先生(せんせい)… ショックを受(う)けてる

translation.en: We should go find him. Maybe we can help him feel better.
translation.ja: ボクたちで 先生(せんせい)を元気(げんき)づけようよ

translation.en: Good idea, Frankie.
translation.ja: いい考(かんが)えだね

translation.en: [Katya] Igor, where are you?
translation.ja: イゴール先生(せんせい)　どこなの？

translation.en: Where'd he go?
translation.ja: どこに消(き)えた？

translation.en: -Not in there. -Not here either.
translation.ja: いない ここにも

translation.en: [Cleo] Found him!
translation.ja: 見(み)つけた

translation.en: Igor? We've been looking for you.
translation.ja: 先生(せんせい)をさがしてたのよ

translation.en: We were worried about you!
translation.ja: みんなが心配(しんぱい)してる

translation.en: -Are you OK? -I'm sorry, Super Monsters.
translation.ja: 大丈夫(だいじょうぶ)？ 心配(しんぱい)かけてすまない

translation.en: I got so carried away with trying to make the biggest,
translation.ja: 調子(ちょうし)に乗(の)りすぎた 最高(さいこう)のイルミネーションに したかったのに

translation.en: brightest holiday display ever...
translation.ja: 最高(さいこう)のイルミネーションに したかったのに

translation.en: that I blew out all the power and I ruined Christmas!
translation.ja: クリスマスを 台無(だいな)しにしてしまった

translation.en: It's OK, Igor! Everybody makes mistakes.
translation.ja: 気(き)にしないで 誰(だれ)でも失敗(しっぱい)はする

translation.en: Oh! Thank you, kiddos.
translation.ja: みんな ありがとう

translation.en: And you didn't ruin Christmas.
translation.ja: 楽(たの)しみが残(のこ)ってる

translation.en: We can still decorate the tree!
translation.ja: ツリーの飾(かざ)りつけ

translation.en: But... no one will be able to see it in the dark.
translation.ja: しかし 暗(くら)くちゃ見(み)えない

translation.en: Don't worry, Igor, we'll find a way to make it special.
translation.ja: 心配(しんぱい)しないで わたしたちが何(なん)とかする

translation.en: I bet my dad will know how to fix the power!
translation.ja: パパなら修理(しゅうり)できるかも

translation.en: I just called him! Mr. Mash is on his way!
translation.ja: 電話(でんわ)したら来(き)てくれるって

translation.en: Oh, that's great!
translation.ja: それは よかった

translation.en: Maybe he can turn the lights back on before Santa gets here!
translation.ja: サンタが来(く)る前(まえ)に 明(あ)かりがつくかも

translation.en: It looks like somebody got their power working.
translation.ja: 見(み)て　誰(だれ)かが 電気(でんき)を直(なお)したみたい

translation.en: Over there! See those twinkly lights?
translation.ja: 見(み)て　誰(だれ)かが 電気(でんき)を直(なお)したみたい ほら あの光(ひかり)

translation.en: -Those aren't twinkly lights! -They're fire dragonflies!
translation.ja: どうやら違(ちが)うみたいだ 光(ひか)るトンボだわ

translation.en: Come on, Spike! Let's go!
translation.ja: 一緒(いっしょ)に来(き)て　スパイク

translation.en: -Ready, Spike? -Ready, Cleo!
translation.ja: いくわよ いいよ　クレオ

translation.en: -Wow! Awesome! -Beautiful!
translation.ja: キレイだね

translation.en: ♪ We lay together around the tree And see our best friends there ♪
translation.ja: ツリーを囲(かこ)もう 　　友(とも)だちの顔(かお)が見(み)える

translation.en: ♪ It's not about the things we have It's about the things we share ♪
translation.ja: 大切(たいせつ)なのは 分(わ)かち合(あ)うこと

translation.en: ♪ Then in turn together. Aha! It's the best time of the year ♪
translation.ja: 一緒(いっしょ)に祝(いわ)うことさ クリスマスは最高(さいこう)

translation.en: ♪ How it is so much fun Whenever friends are near ♪
translation.ja: 友(とも)だちと一緒(いっしょ)なら 　　それだけで楽(たの)しい

translation.en: -Igor? What's the matter? -Don't you like the tree?
translation.ja: 先生(せんせい)　どうしたの？ これじゃダメ？

translation.en: Oh, I don't just like it. I love it!
translation.ja: ダメどころか… 超気(ちょうき)に入(い)ったよ

translation.en: [Santa] Ho, ho, ho! So do I!
translation.ja: わしもだよ

translation.en: [all] Santa Claus!
translation.ja: サンタさんだ

translation.en: Igor, my old friend!
translation.ja: イゴール　久(ひさ)しぶり

translation.en: I've never seen a more beautiful Christmas tree.
translation.ja: こんなキレイなツリーは 初(はじ)めてだ

translation.en: I can tell it was decorated with true Holiday Spirit!
translation.ja: クリスマスの心(こころ)で 光(ひか)りかがやいている

translation.en: It certainly was!
translation.ja: まったく そのとおりじゃ

translation.en: Thank you, Super Monsters.
translation.ja: みんな ありがとう

translation.en: You reminded me that the most important thing about celebrating the holidays
translation.ja: 祝(いわ)うことの意味(いみ)を 思(おも)い出(だ)させてくれた

translation.en: isn't how you celebrate it, but who you celebrate it with.
translation.ja: 大切(たいせつ)なのは“誰(だれ)と祝(いわ)う”だ 飾(かざ)り立(た)てることじゃない

translation.en: I've fixed the power!
translation.ja: 修理(しゅうり)したよ

translation.en: You can turn the lights back on as soon as you want.
translation.ja: いつでも使(つか)えます

translation.en: Thanks, Dad!
translation.ja: ありがと パパ

translation.en: But could we leave the lights off just a little while longer?
translation.ja: でも少(すこ)しの間(あいだ) 消(け)したままにしていい？

translation.en: Of course we can, Frankie.
translation.ja: もちろんだよ

translation.en: Glorb, you're absolutely right! This tree does need a star on top.
translation.ja: グローブ　お前(まえ)の言(い)うとおり てっぺんには星(ほし)を飾(かざ)らないと

translation.en: Which one would you like?
translation.ja: どの星(ほし)がいい？

translation.en: Really? From up there?
translation.ja: 空(そら)から選(えら)ぶの？

translation.en: How about that one?
translation.ja: それじゃ…　あれは？

translation.en: There you go!
translation.ja: このとおり

translation.en: Thank you, Santa, it's perfect!
translation.ja: ありがとう　完(かん)ぺきだ

translation.en: I think it's time to say goodnight!
translation.ja: そろそろ帰(かえ)るわ

translation.en: And I think it's time to turn the power back on.
translation.ja: 電気(でんき)を戻(もど)すことにしよう

translation.en: Ready, Dad?
translation.ja: いいかい？

translation.en: [both] Monster-smash!
translation.ja: モンスター･スマッシュ

translation.en: Thank you, Frankie. And Merry Christmas!
translation.ja: ありがとう メリークリスマス

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Mrs. Carradine!
translation.ja: メリークリスマス

translation.en: Well I guess we have to take down some of the lights,
translation.ja: 少(すこ)し飾(かざ)りを減(へ)らさないと…

translation.en: or the power will blow out again.
translation.ja: また停電(ていでん)は困(こま)るからな

translation.en: Poor, Igor, he's so disappointed.
translation.ja: かわいそうに… 元気(げんき)をなくしてる

translation.en: Dad, isn't there some way we can use our monster powers
translation.ja: ボクらの力(ちから)で 何(なん)とかできない？

translation.en: to light up all of Igor's decorations?
translation.ja: 全部(ぜんぶ)に明(あ)かりをつけたい

translation.en: Well, we can try.
translation.ja: 試(ため)してみるか

translation.en: Maybe I can add a little Christmas magic to your monster magic?
translation.ja: わしも協力(きょうりょく)する クリスマスの魔法(まほう)を使(つか)おう

translation.en: Let's get these decorations powered up.
translation.ja: それでは電気をつけるぞ

translation.en: [both] Monster-smash.
translation.ja: モンスター･スマッシュ！

translation.en: Oh, it's just how I imagined it! Thank you!
translation.ja: 思(おも)い描(えが)いたとおりだ ありがとう　キミたちが 願(ねが)いをかなえてくれた

translation.en: You made my holiday wish come true!
translation.ja: ありがとう　キミたちが 願(ねが)いをかなえてくれた

translation.en: Maybe we could add a few more lights.
translation.ja: もう少(すこ)し増(ふ)やさないか？

translation.en: [children outraged] Igor!
translation.ja: イゴール先生(せんせい)ったら

translation.en: You know, old friend, I think it looks perfect just the way it is!
translation.ja: いいかね　わが友(とも)よ 今(いま)のままで完(かん)ぺきじゃないか

translation.en: Santa, can you stay for snack time?
translation.ja: サンタさん　お菓子(かし)は？

translation.en: Igor made ginger snaps with lemon icing.
translation.ja: レモンのジンジャークッキー

translation.en: Oh, ho! My favorite cookies!
translation.ja: わしの大好物(だいこうぶつ)だよ

translation.en: But I really can't stay much longer.
translation.ja: しかし 長居(ながい)はできない

translation.en: The reindeer and I still have a lot of gifts to deliver.
translation.ja: これから プレゼントを配(くば)るんだ

translation.en: Huh! Was that a reindeer?
translation.ja: トナカイ？

translation.en: Were those Santa's reindeer?
translation.ja: サンタさんのトナカイ？

translation.en: -Well, Santa's sleigh is still here. -But what happened to the reindeer?
translation.ja: ソリはあるけど… トナカイはどこに？

translation.en: -Someone untied his reins. -Who would do that?
translation.ja: 誰(だれ)かがつなを外(はず)した 誰(だれ)がやった？

translation.en: Oh, ho ho, I think I know who...
translation.ja: 見当(けんとう)はついてるよ

translation.en: [all] Glorb! Henri!
translation.ja: グローブ！　アンリ！

translation.en: You two are very naughty Monster Pets.
translation.ja: イタズラばっかりするのね

translation.en: It's OK, Katya. Henri was just being playful.
translation.ja: いいんじゃよ　カティア アンリはふざけただけ グローブは あいつらしい

translation.en: And Glorb was just being Glorb.
translation.ja: アンリはふざけただけ グローブは あいつらしい

translation.en: But... what about your reindeer?
translation.ja: トナカイはどうする？

translation.en: Oh, I'm sure they're just having a little fun
translation.ja: ちょっと遊(あそ)んでくるだけだ

translation.en: and playing one of their reindeer games!
translation.ja: いつものゲームだろう

translation.en: What kind of games do they play?
translation.ja: 何(なん)のゲーム？

translation.en: Their favorite game is Hide and Seek!
translation.ja: “かくれんぼ”が好(す)きなんだ

translation.en: Oh! We love playing Hide and Seek!
translation.ja: ボクらも大好(だいす)きだ

translation.en: Don't worry, Santa, I'm sure we can find your reindeer, no matter where they're hiding!
translation.ja: 心配(しんぱい)しないで 必(かなら)ず見(み)つけ出(だ)してあげる

translation.en: Come on! We need to get the other Super Monsters and...
translation.ja: 行(い)きましょう　みんな一緒(いっしょ)に

translation.en: [all] Find those reindeer!
translation.ja: トナカイをさがせ！

translation.en: Super Monsters, Santa is counting on us. We can't let him down.
translation.ja: サンタさんは ボクたちが頼(たよ)りなんだ

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.ja: さあ行(い)くぞ

translation.en: -We're sorry, Santa. -We looked everywhere!
translation.ja: ごめんなさい さがし回(まわ)ったけど…

translation.en: But we can't find them.
translation.ja: いなかった

translation.en: I told you they were really good at hiding.
translation.ja: 上手(じょうず)に隠(かく)れるからね

translation.en: But I need to find them soon,
translation.ja: しかし 早(はや)く見(み)つけないと…

translation.en: or I won't have enough time to deliver Christmas presents to everyone in Pitchfork Pines!
translation.ja: 町(まち)じゅうにプレゼントを 配(くば)る時間(じかん)がなくなる

translation.en: Oh, no!
translation.ja: それは大変(たいへん)だ

translation.en: You mean our friends could wake up on Christmas morning and not have any presents?
translation.ja: 朝(あさ) 起(お)きても プレゼントがないなんて！

translation.en: We can't let that happen.
translation.ja: 何(なん)とかしなきゃ

translation.en: I'll keep looking for them. They can't have gone too far.
translation.ja: さがしに行(い)く 近(ちか)くにいるはずだ

translation.en: If we can't find the reindeer... maybe there's another way we can help.
translation.ja: 別(べつ)の方法(ほうほう)で サンタさんを助(たす)けましょう

translation.en: Well, I'm not a flying reindeer,
translation.ja: いいかい？ オレは空飛(そらと)ぶバンパイアだよ

translation.en: but I am a flying vampire. Maybe I can pull Santa's sleigh!
translation.ja: いいかい？ オレは空飛(そらと)ぶバンパイアだよ ソリを引(ひ)けるかも

translation.en: Bats! It's too heavy.
translation.ja: サイアク　重(おも)すぎる

translation.en: Let me help you! Roar!
translation.ja: 手伝(てつだ)うよ

translation.en: I'll help too. Mummy power!
translation.ja: わたしも！　ミイラ･パワー

translation.en: -[Drac] Watch out! -[Spike] Be careful!
translation.ja: 危(あぶ)ない！

translation.en: Mega-size! Wow, the sleigh is really heavy,
translation.ja: 大(おお)きくなれ！ なんて重(おも)いんだ メガサイズのボクでも大変(たいへん)だ

translation.en: even for mega-me.
translation.ja: なんて重(おも)いんだ メガサイズのボクでも大変(たいへん)だ

translation.en: Oh, I have an idea!
translation.ja: いい考(かんが)えがあるわ

translation.en: Holiday magic bright and shiny, the sleigh is too big, let's make it tiny!
translation.ja: クリスマスのキラキラ魔法(まほう) 大(おお)きなソリよ　小(ちい)さくなれ

translation.en: OK, the sleigh and I are ready to fly!
translation.ja: これなら ソリと一緒(いっしょ)に飛(と)べるわ

translation.en: That's a great spell, Katya, but won't it make the presents too small?
translation.ja: すごいけど プレゼントまで小(ちい)さくなった

translation.en: Oops... good point!
translation.ja: 確(たし)かに

translation.en: Holiday magic, that wasn't the way, Santa Claus needs a much bigger sleigh!
translation.ja: やり直(なお)し　サンタさんが 必要(ひつよう)なサイズになれ

translation.en: I still can't find my reindeer...
translation.ja: トナカイが見(み)つからん

translation.en: Super Monsters, can you use your super powers to help Santa fly his sleigh?
translation.ja: スーパーパワーで ソリを動(うご)かせない？

translation.en: -We've been trying! -Drac pulled...
translation.ja: ダメなんだ ドラクが引(ひ)いても

translation.en: -And Spike helped push. -Cleo added her wind power...
translation.ja: スパイクが押(お)しても クレオの風(かぜ)も

translation.en: And Katya used her magic!
translation.ja: カティアの魔法(まほう)も

translation.en: Oh, dear. If all of you working together didn't help, I don't know what will.
translation.ja: そうなの… みんなで協力(きょうりょく)しても ダメなのね

translation.en: I do! You already know how to work together...
translation.ja: いいえ 方法(ほうほう)ならあるかも みんなで一緒(いっしょ)に飛(と)べばいいの

translation.en: but this will help you fly together.
translation.ja: 方法(ほうほう)ならあるかも みんなで一緒(いっしょ)に飛(と)べばいいの

translation.en: First, we'll need a really strong, stretchy rope.
translation.ja: まず強(つよ)いロープがいる

translation.en: Oh! Instead of stretchy rope, how about stretchy vines?
translation.ja: ロープの代(か)わりに 植物(しょくぶつ)のつるでは？

translation.en: May I?
translation.ja: ちょっと失礼(しつれい)

translation.en: Yeah! [laughs]
translation.ja: いいぞ

translation.en: [Zoe] Perfect!
translation.ja: 完(かん)ぺきよ

translation.en: Ooh, ooh! Can I drive?
translation.ja: 運転(うんてん)させて

translation.en: Super Monsters, let's fly!
translation.ja: スーパーモンスターズ 出発(しゅっぱつ)だ！

translation.en: [Santa] Ho, ho, ho! It's working!
translation.ja: うまくいった いいぞ

translation.en: -[Esme] Well done! -[Igor] It works!
translation.ja: 上出来(じょうでき)だね

translation.en: Now everyone in Pitchfork Pines will get their Christmas presents!
translation.ja: これでみんなに プレゼントを渡(わた)せる

translation.en: I hope so,
translation.ja: プレゼントを 配(くば)り終(お)えられるといいが…

translation.en: but I might not be able to deliver all the presents before the sun comes up.
translation.ja: プレゼントを 配(くば)り終(お)えられるといいが… 日(ひ)の出(で)までに

translation.en: -But you have to! -I'll try my best, Frankie.
translation.ja: やらなきゃ そうだね　フランキー

translation.en: But climbing down chimneys takes a lot of time.
translation.ja: しかし 煙突(えんとつ)を通(とお)るのは 大変(たいへん)じゃ

translation.en: Oh! I can use my zombie powers to help! Then you won't need the chimneys.
translation.ja: わたしのパワーなら 煙突(えんとつ)は使(つか)わない

translation.en: I can use my mega-strength to carry the bag of presents!
translation.ja: サンタさんの袋(ふくろ)は ボクの怪力(かいりき)で

translation.en: And I'll use my werewolf speed to help put the presents under the trees fast, fast, fast!
translation.ja: ボクは超(ちょう)スピードで プレゼントを置(お)く

translation.en: Oh, ho, ho, ho! Sounds like we have a plan.
translation.ja: そのプランでいこう

translation.en: [all] We're going to save Christmas!
translation.ja: みんなでクリスマスを救(すく)おう

translation.en: Oh, no! The roof's too steep to land. The sleigh will slide right off.
translation.ja: この急(きゅう)な屋根(やね)じゃ ソリがすべり落(お)ちる

translation.en: But if we land on the ground, someone might see us.
translation.ja: 下(した)に停(と)めたら 誰(だれ)かに見(み)つかるかも

translation.en: It'll spoil the surprise.
translation.ja: がっかりするよ

translation.en: It's OK, Spike. Vida's with us.
translation.ja: ヴィーダにまかせて

translation.en: This way, Santa!
translation.ja: こっちよ

translation.en: Let's go, let's go!
translation.ja: 全速力(ぜんそくりょく)だ！

translation.en: ♪ Jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way ♪
translation.ja: ジングルベル 　　ジングルベル 鈴(すず)が鳴(な)る

translation.en: ♪ Oh, what fun is it to ride On a one-horse open sleigh ♪
translation.ja: 馬(うま)が引(ひ)く 　　楽(たの)しいソリに乗(の)って

translation.en: ♪ Jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way ♪
translation.ja: ジングルベル 　　ジングルベル 鈴(すず)が鳴(な)る

translation.en: ♪ Oh, what fun is it to ride On a one-horse open sleigh ♪
translation.ja: ジングルベル 　　ジングルベル 鈴(すず)が鳴(な)る 馬(うま)が引(ひ)く 　　楽(たの)しいソリに乗(の)って

translation.en: ♪ Dashing through the snow In a one-horse open sleigh ♪
translation.ja: ソリに乗(の)り 　　雪(ゆき)のなかを駆(か)けていく

translation.en: ♪ Through the fields we go Laughing all the way ♪
translation.ja: どこも笑(わら)い声(ごえ)であふれてる

translation.en: ♪ Bells on bobtail ring Making spirits bright ♪
translation.ja: ベルの音(ね)に 気持(きも)ちも弾(はず)む

translation.en: ♪ What fun it is to ride and sing A sleighing song tonight ♪
translation.ja: ソリに乗(の)って 歌(うた)って 　　　　　楽(たの)しい夜(よる)だ

translation.en: ♪ Oh, jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way! ♪
translation.ja: ジングルベル 　　ジングルベル 鈴(すず)が鳴(な)る

translation.en: ♪ Oh, what fun is it to ride In a one-horse open sleigh ♪
translation.ja: 馬(うま)が引(ひ)く 　　楽(たの)しいソリに乗(の)って

translation.en: We did it! We delivered presents to everyone.
translation.ja: やった！ みんなにプレゼントを配(くば)れた

translation.en: Well done, Super Monsters! You saved Christmas in Pitchfork Pines!
translation.ja: お手柄(てがら)だ スーパーモンスターズ ピッチフォーク･パインズの クリスマスを救(すく)った

translation.en: Oh, there you are! I know you were having fun,
translation.ja: おや おかえり 楽(たの)しんできたようだね

translation.en: but did you forget we have an important job to do?
translation.ja: でも 大事(だいじ)な仕事(しごと)を忘(わす)れたね？

translation.en: If it hadn't been for the Super Monsters,
translation.ja: 彼(かれ)らがいなければ―

translation.en: Christmas in Pitchfork Pines would have been ruined.
translation.ja: クリスマスは ぶちこわしだったよ

translation.en: Thank you for all your help, Super Monsters.
translation.ja: ありがとう　助(たす)かった

translation.en: I couldn't have done it without you.
translation.ja: わし一人(ひとり)じゃムリだった

translation.en: Ho, ho, ho! Merry Christmas!
translation.ja: メリークリスマス！

translation.en: [all] Merry Christmas, Santa!
translation.ja: さよなら　サンタさん

translation.en: What an awesome night!
translation.ja: 素晴(すば)らしい夜(よる)だね

translation.en: And it just got awesome! Look!
translation.ja: もっと素晴(すば)らしいことが…

translation.en: [Super Monsters] Presents!
translation.ja: プレゼントだ

translation.en: Aww, Santa gave Henri a new cat toy!
translation.ja: アンリは新(あたら)しいおもちゃね

translation.en: And he gave Glorb a Teddy Bat!
translation.ja: グローブにはぬいぐるみ

translation.en: And he gave us the best gift we could ever wish for!
translation.ja: ボクたちも 最高(さいこう)のプレゼントをもらった

translation.en: -How do you know? -You haven't even opened them yet.
translation.ja: なぜ わかる？ 見(み)てないのに

translation.en: Oh, we know those presents are going to be great!
translation.ja: 本当(ほんとう)のプレゼントは…

translation.en: But the best present was being able to work together...
translation.ja: みんなで力(ちから)を合(あ)わせたこと

translation.en: and help Santa save Christmas!
translation.ja: サンタさんの役(やく)に立(た)てたこと

translation.en: Now that's what the holiday spirit is all about!
translation.ja: それこそが クリスマスの心(こころ)だわ

translation.en: It certainly is!
translation.ja: そうだね　同感(どうかん)だ

translation.en: [all] Sun up! Super Monsters!
translation.ja: 日(ひ)が昇(のぼ)る スーパーモンスターズだ！

translation.en: Merry Christmas, everyone!
translation.ja: みんな　メリークリスマス！

translation.en: ♪ La la la la la la Super Monsters ♪
translation.ja: スーパー！ モンスターズ！

translation.en: ♪ Super Monsters ♪
translation.ja: スーパーモンスターズ！

translation.en: ♪ We're Super Monsters We're human in the daylight ♪
translation.ja: 太陽(たいよう)の下(した)では 人間(にんげん)だけど

translation.en: ♪ We're Super Monsters We become monsters at night ♪
translation.ja: 夜(よる)になれば 　　モンスターに変身(へんしん)だ

translation.en: ♪ In Pitchfork Pines we learn And help each other grow ♪
translation.ja: プレスクールでお勉強(べんきょう) 助(たす)けあって 成長(せいちょう)しよう

translation.en: ♪ There's magic in twilight That's when we start to glow ♪
translation.ja: 夕日(ゆうひ)が沈(しず)めば ボクらの時間(じかん)の始(はじ)まりだ

translation.en: ♪ Sun down Monsters up! ♪
translation.ja: 日(ひ)が沈(しず)む モンスターズ･タイム！

translation.en: ♪ I'm Drac, flying fast ♪
translation.ja: 空飛(そらと)ぶドラク

translation.en: ♪ Cleo, wind power Spike, dragon clouds ♪
translation.ja: 風使(かぜつか)いのクレオ 雲(くも)を出(だ)すスパイク

translation.en: ♪ Zoe, zombie vision Lobo, super speed ♪
translation.ja: ゾーイの透視(とうし) 高速(こうそく)のロボ

translation.en: ♪ Katya, magic spells Frankie, stomp ♪
translation.ja: カティアの魔法(まほう) 怪力(かいりき) フランキー

translation.en: ♪ We're Super Monsters Monsters ♪
translation.ja: それがボクたち モンスターズだ
